imdb.plot outline: There is a boy named Wu Mian who loves basketball, and he is a third year student in middle school. This is a touching story on Wu Mian, his passion basketball, his parents and his friends. In order to defeat Class Three, the old rival of his class, in School Basketball Competition, Wu Mian and several boys in his class team up as the Deer basketball team. However, conflicts among them emerge from time to time. Faced with multiple difficulties, Wu Mian and his teammates go through a lot, and eventually earn support and understanding from their teacher, friends and families. In this process, Wu Mian also resolves his misunderstanding about his mother's boyfriend and reaches out to him with open arms. Then Wu Mian, his mother, and his mother's boyfriend come together in supporting his father whose career suffers a setback. At last, with the support from their friends and their families, Deer basketball team wins. And boys from two classes who used to be rivals are bound together by their friendship.
imdb.title: Nan sheng ri ji
